intro: Siderobombyx, commonly known as the iron-winged beetle, is a genus of metallic beetles belonging to the family Buprestidae, known for their striking iridescent colors. Their diet primarily consists of decaying wood, which provides the necessary nutrients for their development. The genus plays a role in the decomposition process, contributing to nutrient cycling in forest ecosystems.
